title: Himi 269
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e kakai halaia,
Pea tu’utāmaki,
‘A e hako ‘o ‘Atama
Tukufakaholo.
2.
’Oku kovi ‘etau anga,
Vale mo e loto,
Pea tupu ta’e hoko,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Ka na’e ‘ofa kumi mai,
‘A Sīsū Kalaisi,
Ki hotau fa’ahinga kovi,
Ke ne fakahaofi.
4.
Pea ‘oku ‘ia Sīsū,
Mo ‘ene pekia,
‘Oku tau kei mo’ui ai,
Ke fakatomala.
5.
Tau tokanga loto taha
Ki hotau Huhu’i,
Ko hotau hūfanga Ia,
Ke tau kumi ki ai. *
